Package foodcatering_package

Class Customer

java.lang.Object
foodcatering_package.Customer
Direct Known Subclasses:
Guest, Loyalty_Customer
abstract class Customer
extends java.lang.Object
Abstract class used for the Customers data and functions. Uses Inheritance. Uses Final methods. Uses Overloading Uses Liskov Substitution Principle

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Customer()
    Default class Constructor to initialize empty users.
    Customer​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String password)
    Constructor used to initialize user saving their name and password.
    Customer​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String password, java.util.ArrayList<Order> Orders)
    Constructor used to initialize user using name, password and Order List.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    (package private) void Cancel_Order()
    Method used to cancel the order that the Customer asks to cancel.
    (package private) abstract void Create_Order()  
    (package private) void Order_Tracker()
    Method used to show all the Orders made by the user with their details and the food items in each.
    (package private) void Review()
    Method used to allow user to add a review after receiving and order.
    (package private) void Update_Order()
    Method used to extend the order's delivery date or to add more items to it.
    (package private) void View_Cart()
    Method used to view all items in the cart.
    (package private) void WishList()
    Method used to show the Customer the meals located in their wish list giving the option to order them right away.

      password - Customer's password.

  • Method Details

    • Create_Order

      abstract void Create_Order()

    • Cancel_Order

      final void Cancel_Order()
      Method used to cancel the order that the Customer asks to cancel.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if user picks index not available in the list.

    • Update_Order

      final void Update_Order()
      Method used to extend the order's delivery date or to add more items to it.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if user picks index not available in the list.

    • Review

      final void Review()
      Method used to allow user to add a review after receiving and order.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if user picks index not available in the list.

    • View_Cart

      final void View_Cart()
      Method used to view all items in the cart. Giving the options to add the meal to the wish list or make an order out of it.

    • WishList

      final void WishList()
      Method used to show the Customer the meals located in their wish list giving the option to order them right away.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if user picks index not available in the list.

    • Order_Tracker

      final void Order_Tracker()
      Method used to show all the Orders made by the user with their details and the food items in each. Also giving the options to update , cancel or review.
